summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LockBay Telegram Escrow Bot status server. All backend endpoints (/health, /status, /) function correctly in setup mode. Frontend displays proper status page with Bot Status card, Setup Checklist, and Next Steps. System correctly indicates missing DATABASE_URL and TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN configuration.

configuration_issues.issue: DATABASE_URL and TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN not configured - running in setup mode
configuration_issues.impact: Expected behavior - backend runs minimal status server instead of full bot functionality
configuration_issues.note: This is the intended setup mode per review request context

passed_tests: Backend /health endpoint returns proper JSON with status, config, and next_steps
Health endpoint shows correct config status (missing DATABASE_URL and BOT_TOKEN)
Backend /status endpoint returns app info with proper structure
Status endpoint shows correct component statuses (FastAPI running, PostgreSQL/Bot not configured, Redis optional)
Backend root / endpoint returns proper message and setup mode
API prefix middleware handles /api prefix correctly
Frontend loads and displays LockBay status page successfully
Frontend Bot Status card shows server online with setup mode indicator
Frontend Setup Checklist shows correct statuses: FastAPI Running, Dependencies Installed, PostgreSQL needs DATABASE_URL, Bot Token needs configuration, Tables pending DB connection, Redis optional
Frontend Next Steps section displays when config is missing with proper guidance
All data-testid attributes present for robust testing
Frontend correctly integrates with backend /health API
